title: Folding Hand Fan
description:
A brightly colored folding hand fan.

Can be used to talk about fans, both manual and electric. Can also be used to reference various dances involving fans including the Korean dance of Buchaechum, the Japanese dance of Nihon-buy≈ç, and the Maranao dance of the Singkil.

May be used to refer to a person who is a fan (or admirer) of someone or something.

May also be used along with the phrases fan the flames or when shit hits the fan.
apple_vendor_description: The folding hand fan emoji on Apple devices is an exquisite depiction of elegance and tradition, crafted with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and smooth, refined lines. Its delicate folds are rendered with subtle gradients, suggesting fine paper or silk, and a gentle curve that hints at its graceful function. This emoji, with its inherent sense of style and a touch of mystique, is perfect for conveying a sense of coolness, sophistication, or even a hint of dramatic flair in messages, bringing a touch of artistic sensibility to your digital communications on Apple devices.
